actions.committee: House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce.

official_title: A bill to require persons building powerplants which use public waters to operate cooling towers, unless they can demonstrate that there is no need for such towers, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Thermal Loading Act - Requires persons building powerplants which use or divert waters to operate cooling towers, unless they can demonstrate that there is no need for such towers. Establishes a fine of $10,000 and imprisonment of six months, or both for violations of the provisions of this Act.

titles.title: A bill to require persons building powerplants which use public waters to operate cooling towers, unless they can demonstrate that there is no need for such towers, and for other purposes.
